result.purpose: Generates TLS configurations for a test server and client that trust each other using an in-memory certificate authority.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating TLS configuration generation logic within a single Go file, promoting reusability and separation of concerns.

internal/tlstest/tls.go.purpose: Generates TLS configurations for a test server and client that trust each other using an in-memory certificate authority.
side_effects: Generates and encodes certificates and private keys in PEM format.
risks: Potential exposure of private keys if not handled securely.
